articles.author: Lauran Neergaard
articles.title: It's flu vaccine time, even if you've had your COVID shots - Associated Press
articles.description: Amid all the focus on COVID-19 vaccinations, U.S. health experts have another plea: Don’t skip your flu shot. Flu cases have dropped to historically low levels during the pandemic. The U.S. and Europe experienced hardly any flu last winter, and the Southern H…
articles.content:
Amid all the focus on COVID-19 vaccinations, U.S. health experts have another plea: Dont skip your flu shot.
